most_active_tickets.title: pieces-for-developers crashes at startup on ubuntu 24.04 LTS
Cannot collapse all code block in Pieces Desktop
Pro user's LLM cannot be upgraded to the latest version, even if they are chosen to

common_issues.title: Pieces for Developers and Pieces OS Upgrade Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing difficulties with Pieces for Developers crashing on startup (Ubuntu) and LLM models not upgrading to the selected versions (Windows).  The Pieces for Developers crash on Ubuntu involves a GTK incompatibility.  The LLM upgrade issue may be related to Pieces OS version incompatibility or network connectivity problems.  Suggested solutions include checking system dependencies, ensuring Pieces OS and Pieces for Developers are on compatible versions, and verifying network connectivity.

related_issues.title: pieces-for-developers crashes at startup on ubuntu 24.04 LTS
related_issues.text:
pieces-for-developers crashes at startup on ubuntu 24.04 LTS
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Linux

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

When I launch pieces-for-developers a window briefly appears and then disappears. 

The first time after I reboot a blank window appears and Ubuntu displayed the "application not responding" dialog. No matter how many times I clicked "wait" it never appeared to start. I've not been able to reproduce however and now the blank window appears and almost immediately disappears

System is running Ubuntu 24.04 LTS using X11 with nvidia device drivers

pieces-os           12.2.1            (105)   1GB -
pieces-for-developers 4.3.3            (94) 173MB

The `~/.local/share/com.pieces.os` folder does not appear to have been created

Output from when starting with debug flag

```
pieces-for-developers --debug
Gtk-Message: 08:24:44.749: Not loading module "atk-bridge": The functionality is provided by GTK natively. Please try to not load it.

(pieces_for_x:12556): Gtk-WARNING **: 08:24:44.845: GTK+ module /snap/pieces-for-developers/94/gnome-platform/usr/lib/gtk-2.0/modules/libcanberra-gtk-module.so cannot be loaded.
GTK+ 2.x symbols detected. Using GTK+ 2.x and GTK+ 3 in the same process is not supported.
Gtk-Message: 08:24:44.845: Failed to load module "canberra-gtk-module"

(pieces_for_x:12556): Gtk-WARNING **: 08:24:44.846: GTK+ module /snap/pieces-for-developers/94/gnome-platform/usr/lib/gtk-2.0/modules/libcanberra-gtk-module.so cannot be loaded.
GTK+ 2.x symbols detected. Using GTK+ 2.x and GTK+ 3 in the same process is not supported.
Gtk-Message: 08:24:44.846: Failed to load module "canberra-gtk-module"
RuntimeFlutterCodeHighlighter initialized with path: /snap/pieces-for-developers/94/lib/libruntime_code_highlighter.so
Debug: Starting logger initialization...
Debug: SimpleLogger configured with Level.ALL
Debug: SimpleLogger formatter configured
Debug: Sentry initialized
Debug: Sentry logger configured
Debug: Log directory initialized at: /home/dns/snap/pieces-for-developers/94/.local/share/com.pieces.os.dependency_management
Debug: About to complete initialization...
Debug: Initialization completed
INFO: [LOGGER::initialized] Logger initialized successfully with updated directory: /home/dns/Documents/com.pieces.pfd/production/logs
[xcb] Unknown sequence number while processing reply
[xcb] Most likely this is a multi-threaded client and XInitThreads has not been called
[xcb] Aborting, sorry about that.
pieces_for_x: ../../src/xcb_io.c:730: _XReply: Assertion `!xcb_xlib_threads_sequence_lost' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)
```
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Cannot collapse all code block in Pieces Desktop
related_issues.text: Cannot collapse all code block in Pieces Desktop ### Checked for Existing Issues? - [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this. ### Software Desktop Application ### Operating System / Platform Windows ### Your Pieces OS Version 12.2.2 ### Early Access Program - [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature. ### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug. Desktop 4.3.4 + Pieces OS 12.2.1~12.2.2 have this problem https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/08ebfc5d-1e12-4bae-bd0d-26d504157e8a Desktop 4.3.4 reminds me to upgrade Pieces OS in MS store, but... MS store has not provided the latest Pieces OS version > 12.2.1 (Previously I do @ 12.2.2, I temporarly switch back to 12.2.1, they all, together with Desktop 4.3.4 have this problem) Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Pro user's LLM cannot be upgraded to the latest version, even if they are chosen to
related_issues.text: Pro user's LLM cannot be upgraded to the latest version, even if they are chosen to ### Checked for Existing Issues? - [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this. ### Software Desktop Application, Pieces OS, Visual Studio, Sublime Plugin, VS Code ### Operating System / Platform Windows 11 ### Your Pieces OS Version 12.1.1 ### Early Access Program - [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature. ### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug. I have a small problem now that cannot be solved through LLM: - I have inquired with LLM in **pieces for developers** and **pieces vscode plugin**, and they all said they are Sonnet 3.5. - The pieces LLM in sublime (set claude 3.7 sonnet) keeps silence about this: **Copilot**: I'm an AI assistant created by Anthropic named Claude, and my training data has a cutoff date. While I don't typically specify my exact version details, I can tell you that my knowledge cutoff is around late 2023. This means I don't have information about events, technologies, or developments that occurred after that time. However, - I just **upgraded to Pieces Pro yesterday** and have switched to Sonnet 4 (for all pieces IDE plugins and Desktop Apps, except for sublime which only support sonnet 3.7 till now). - Every test chat was opened in a new Chat after the LLM is switched( to Sonnet 4 or Gemini 2.5 Pro)... - I've checked the configuration files and they are all Sonnet 4 without any issues. - I have tried restarting my computer or logging in to my account again, but still have this bug - I have tried changing my computer and VPN node, including canceling or adding the global system proxy, but none of them worked PS: My pieces OS and pieces for developers are both installed in sequence on Microsoft Store. - They work well in other aspects. - I have been using them for about 7 days. - I am in Chinese Mainland, thus a heavy VPN user. ## Pieces for Deveopers (desktop app) ## Vscode plugin ## Sublime plugin Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Issues Upgrading Pieces Pro and Accessing Features
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing difficulty upgrading to Pieces Pro and accessing associated features like the latest LLM models. Problems include the inability to select the desired LLM version despite upgrading, blank upgrade pages leading to checkout view errors, and issues with code block collapsing.  Troubleshooting steps include checking configuration files, restarting the application and system, verifying Pieces OS version compatibility, and ensuring network connectivity.

related_issues.title: Unable to upgrade subscription
related_issues.text:
Unable to upgrade subscription
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Every time I click "Upgrade" from ANYWHERE - to upgrade to pro, it leads to a page that is blank except for a minimal table, like the bones of a cart checkout view, with like price, subtotal, total, etc. except there are no words, and all the values are 0.00 (zero dollars).. it stays like this for a minute, then says it isn't working properly and returns to the desktop view or the view I was in before. 

been happening for weeks
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces Desktop Application Bugs
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing various issues with the Pieces desktop application, including a pixelated tray icon on macOS, subscription upgrade failures leading to a blank checkout page, and inability to collapse code blocks on Windows.  The upgrade issue has persisted for weeks.  Users are on different macOS and Windows versions and Pieces OS versions 12.1.1 and 12.2.x. Further investigation is needed to identify the root causes and solutions.

The mac tray icon is pixelated. recommendations: Investigate and fix the GTK incompatibility causing Pieces for Developers to crash on startup on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Issue #835).
Address the LLM model upgrade issue where users are unable to select the desired version despite upgrading to Pieces Pro (Issues #818, #839).
Fix the blank upgrade page issue that leads to checkout view errors when users attempt to upgrade to Pieces Pro (Issue #808).
Resolve the issue preventing users from collapsing all code blocks in the Pieces Desktop application on Windows (Issue #839).
Address the pixelated tray icon issue on macOS (Issue #840).
Improve communication to users regarding Pieces OS and Pieces for Developers version compatibility.
